name: ShotLight
description:
You've been here before. Flying down an infinite corridor, shooting down aliens, or rogue AIs, or enemy fighter pilots. You know, the usual.

But now it's black. Pitch black. And you can only see in the glow of your own bullets.

Charge your shots to see your surroundings.

Fire your shots to take down your enemies, recovering health and boosting your charge.

Balance the two to stay alive.

Controls:

Hold 🆉 or Ⓐ: Charge Shot

Release 🆉 or Ⓐ: Fire

[←↕→] or 🕹️: Move
